mapper.sql: ID, STATION_NAME, SERVICE_CHARGE_AMOUNT, BASIC_CHARGE_AMOUNT, PERSON_NAME, PERSON_PHONE, PERSON_TYPE, PERSON_OPENID, CREATE_TIME, PROVINCE, CITY, REGION, ADDRESS, COORD, STATUS, STORE_ID,THIRD_SERVICE_AMOUNT,PERSON_SERVICE_AMOUNT, DC_NUM,AC_NUM,PLAN_USE_TIME,IS_DIRECT,IS_FORMAL,CHARGE_TYPE

ID, STATION_NAME, SERVICE_CHARGE_AMOUNT, BASIC_CHARGE_AMOUNT, PERSON_NAME, PERSON_PHONE, PERSON_TYPE, PERSON_OPENID, CREATE_TIME, PROVINCE, CITY, REGION, ADDRESS, COORD, STATUS, STORE_ID,THIRD_SERVICE_AMOUNT,PERSON_SERVICE_AMOUNT, DC_NUM,AC_NUM,PLAN_USE_TIME,DIRECT_SERVICE_CHARGE_AMOUNT,DIRECT_BASIC_CHARGE_AMOUNT,DIRECT_PERSON_SERVICE_AMOUNT, DIRECT_THIRD_SERVICE_AMOUNT,IS_DIRECT,IS_FORMAL,CHARGE_TYPE
mapper.select:
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(REAL_COUNT),0) FROM elec_order
PILE_ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM elec_pile WHERE CHARGE_STANDARD_ID = #{id})
and END_TIME >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')
and END_TIME <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')

select s.ID, STATION_NAME, SERVICE_CHARGE_AMOUNT, BASIC_CHARGE_AMOUNT, PERSON_NAME, PERSON_PHONE, CHARGE_TYPE, s.PERSON_OPENID, s.CREATE_TIME,s.IS_FORMAL,s.IS_DIRECT FROM elec_station s LEFT JOIN elec_pile p ON s.ID = p.CHARGE_STANDARD_ID where p.ID = #{pileid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT CITY, REGION FROM elec_station GROUP BY REGION ORDER BY CITY

SELECT STATION_NAME, SERVICE_CHARGE_AMOUNT, BASIC_CHARGE_AMOUNT, IS_DIRECT, DIRECT_BASIC_CHARGE_AMOUNT, DIRECT_SERVICE_CHARGE_AMOUNT
FROM elec_station where ID = #{id}

SELECT COUNT(p.ID) FROM elec_station s LEFT JOIN elec_pile p ON s.ID = p.CHARGE_STANDARD_ID
1=1 AND s.ID = #{id}
AND p.TYPE IN (3, 4)
AND p.TYPE IN (5, 6)
mapper.insert: insert into elec_station (ID, STATION_NAME, SERVICE_CHARGE_AMOUNT, BASIC_CHARGE_AMOUNT, PERSON_NAME, PERSON_PHONE, PERSON_OPENID, CREATE_TIME,PROVINCE,CITY,REGION,ADDRESS,COORD,STATUS,STORE_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceChargeAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{basicChargeAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update elec_station
STATION_NAME = #{stationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_CHARGE_AMOUNT = #{serviceChargeAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
BASIC_CHARGE_AMOUNT = #{basicChargeAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
THIRD_SERVICE_AMOUNT = #{thirdServiceAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
PERSON_SERVICE_AMOUNT = #{personServiceAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
PERSON_NAME = #{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERSON_PHONE = #{personPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERSON_OPENID = #{personOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERSON_TYPE = #{personType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGION = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COORD = #{coord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DC_NUM = #{DCNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AC_NUM = #{ACNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PLAN_USE_TIME = #{planUseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DIRECT = #{isDirect},
IS_FORMAL = #{isFormal},
CHARGE_TYPE = #{chargeType},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update elec_station
STATION_NAME = #{stationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_CHARGE_AMOUNT = #{serviceChargeAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
BASIC_CHARGE_AMOUNT = #{basicChargeAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
THIRD_SERVICE_AMOUNT = #{thirdServiceAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
PERSON_SERVICE_AMOUNT = #{personServiceAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
PERSON_NAME = #{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERSON_PHONE = #{personPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERSON_OPENID = #{personOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERSON_TYPE = #{personType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGION = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COORD = #{coord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DC_NUM = #{DCNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AC_NUM = #{ACNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PLAN_USE_TIME = #{planUseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DIRECT = #{isDirect},
DIRECT_SERVICE_CHARGE_AMOUNT = #{directServiceChargeAmount},
DIRECT_BASIC_CHARGE_AMOUNT = #{directBasicChargeAmount},
DIRECT_PERSON_SERVICE_AMOUNT = #{directPersonServiceAmount},
DIRECT_THIRD_SERVICE_AMOUNT = #{directThirdServiceAmount},
IS_FORMAL = #{isFormal},
CHARGE_TYPE = #{chargeType},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update elec_station set STATION_NAME = #{stationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_CHARGE_AMOUNT = #{serviceChargeAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, BASIC_CHARGE_AMOUNT = #{basicChargeAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, PERSON_NAME = #{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERSON_PHONE = #{personPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERSON_OPENID = #{personOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGION = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COORD = #{coord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
